title: Landscape sculptures
creator_credit: David Corke and Crafts Council of Australia
brief_description: Noted artist Claus Bury is shown conducting sculpture workshops with students in the settings of the Australian bush at Noojee and the coastline area of Palm Beach. Suitable for secondary level.
